name: Scouring
purpose: Remove natural and added impurities from textile fibers
method: Alkaline treatment with detergents and sodium hydroxide
process: Continuous or batch process using jiggers, winches, or beck machines

name: Bleaching
purpose: Remove natural coloring matter and achieve high whiteness
method: Oxidative bleaching using hydrogen peroxide or chlorine compounds

name: Mercerizing
purpose: Improve luster, strength, and dye affinity of cotton
method: Treatment with concentrated sodium hydroxide under tension
process: Continuous process with controlled tension and caustic concentration

name: Singeing
purpose: Remove protruding fibers and achieve smooth fabric surface
method: Passing fabric over gas flames or heated plates
process: Continuous process with flame or contact singeing

name: Desizing
purpose: Remove sizing agents applied during weaving

name: Calendering
purpose: Improve smoothness, luster, and hand feel of fabric
method: Passing fabric through heated metal rollers under pressure
process: Multi-bowl calender with controlled pressure and temperature

name: Sanforizing
purpose: Control fabric shrinkage and dimensional stability
method: Controlled shrinkage using moisture, heat, and pressure
process: Sanforizing machine with rubber blanket and heated cylinder

name: Heat Setting
purpose: Stabilize synthetic fabrics and set permanent pleats
method: Dry heat treatment under controlled conditions
process: Pin stenter or tenter frame with precise temperature control
